entries.content: Fixed focus effect bug on message input. The issue was .message-input:focus was trying to change border-color but .message-input has no border. The actual border is on .input-row parent element, which already has :focus-within working correctly. Removed the conflicting border-color from .message-input:focus.
Updated send button border to match options dropdown styling - changed from var(--border-secondary) to rgba(122, 162, 247, 0.15) for visual consistency in the user input toolbar.
Reduced stop button size to 37x37 (1px smaller than send button's 38x38) for subtle scale effect when transitioning to stop state.
Updated stop button border to use provider primary color (--claude-primary: #CC785C) instead of error state color for brand consistency.
